about_the_game:
Start an adventure in a delicately hand-painted fictional world. You will play as the handsome bounty hunter and explore this fantastical and colorful mysterious city - the "Invisible City" , to find the fairy assassin "Green" and complete his revenge.
“Invisible City”:
A city shrouded in “black mist” all year round, with various areas separated, only the elite class of society can travel between various areas through the "train". Ordinary residents cannot have a complete understanding of the “Invisible City”. Therefore, they named the city they live in as the "Invisible City".Due to the “black mist” , each area of the Capital of No Appearance has its own topography and cultural style.
A thrilling and exhilarating battles with comboo:
Wave the sickle symbolizing death in battle. Use a variety of attack derived actions and combine 15 different styles of skills freely to create refreshing combos.
Exquisite hand drawn art style:
There are many exquisite hand drawn backgrounds, animations, and comics in the game. Display the visual characteristics of this game through a large number of frame by frame and grid by grid drawings.
Exciting boss battles:
Dozens of exciting boss battles. Face the monsters with magnificent skills at different stages
Rich growth system:
Talent tree, skill upgrade, equipment system, pet system. Collect materials and search for treasures during the adventure constantly enhances players' abilities
